biography: Margaret Towner (born in 1920) is one of the actresses in Star Wars: Episode I The Phantom Menace.  She was married to actor Raymond Francis, of Carrington V.C. fame, and had three children with him, being one of them another actor, Clive Francis (A Clockwork Orange), who gave her two grandchildren, Harry and Lucinda.  She began acting in 1938, at 18 years of age, making guest appearances in different TV series. She acted in one chapter of crime series The Bill, and also in Keeping Up Appearances and Casualty, from 1993 to 1997.  She gained a role in the cult horror comedy film, The Wolves of Kromer (1998).
name: Margaret Towner
